text: "Took Her to the O" is the third single off of American rapper King Von's mixtape Levon James. The song was released on February 21, 2020. The song was able to make it to #47 on the Billboard Hot 100. It was also certified 3Ã— Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The song is about Von meeting up with a girl and taking her to the Parkway Gardens complex in Chicago, also known as the O'Block. A music video for the song was released. In the video, King Von is rapping to his lawyer about events that took place. Scenes in the music video include Von riding in a car with a woman. He drops the woman off and another man pulls up behind them. The man hits the woman. She runs to Von for help, he gives her phone back and trys to leave. The man picks up a brick and throws it through Von's car window so Von gets out of his car and shoots the man. Von and the woman then drive off. It is heavily implied that the man Von shoots is FBG Duck, another rapper and a member of a rival neighborhood. The music video would be played in the courtroom of FBG Duck's murder trial. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020 songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: Took Her to the O
